Description: Fragment of cream/buff goat skin/hide, folded over; small fragment of dark brown, woollen plain weave textile, edges ragged (warp-1 ply S crepe, dia.0.5mm; weft-1 ply S, dia. 0.9mm; 10x8tpc). Small bundle of dark brown woollen threads; cord of 3 ply Z light brown hairs, dia. 3.5mm; cord of 2 ply Z dark brown hairs, dia. 1.5mm.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Donated by: W S Webb Museum of Anthropology (University of Kentucky)
